name: TecnoDance
description:
This game was made in 28 hours in King's {NotOnlyGamesJam} of 2019.

Think of this like some kind of guitar hero. The player controls the arrows on the bottom and has to put them in the direction of the arrows in the circles before they get to the bottom.

You need special material in order to play the game. You can find out about it here.
